fullName: Contact Us Regression tests: validate error messages on contact us/Feedback page

labels.name: story
labels.value: validate error messages on contact us/Feedback page

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: validate error messages on contact us/Feedback page

name: validate error messages on contact us/Feedback page
description: As Customer, I can navigate to contact us page and submit my data.

steps.name: Given  User launches Jupitor toys shopping website
And  User navigates from Home page to Contact Page
When  User clicks submit button on contact form
Then  Validate error messages for mandatory fields
When  User populate mandatory fields forename as "Steve Smith" and email as "stevesmith@gmail.com" and message as "My son loves to play Jupitor toys"
Then  Validate mandatory error messages are not visible to the user

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: My son loves to play Jupitor toys
